channel.title: Awesome Optical Illusion
channel.description: [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/1344/wallsillusion.gif[/img] i didnt stare at the dot the first time and just saw read the words at the end and it confused me, then i did it with staring at the dot and it was quite wierd. The vividness of the colours fade was the image is left there i find, i have to concentrate really hard to keep the colours there and if i blink or move they disappear

item.title: Awesome Optical Illusion
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Archer, post:20, topic:331789”][quote author=jme link=topic=428165.msg3145245#msg3145245 date=1267989652]
This is probably the coolest optical illusion out there:

http://www.grand-illusions.com/opticalillusions/dragon_illusion/

Watch the video for a demonstration
[/quote]

Awesome, im so doing that lol.

Edit: It took me 3 tries but I got it and it is really cool.[/quote]
Same here, was amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: Awesome Optical Illusion
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:56, topic:331789”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=428165.msg3152127#msg3152127 date=1268634137]
Alright, it’s all done, try it out and tell me how it works for you:

orig:
http://blogs.targetx.com/pbu/Trevor/Nature_Mountains.jpg
illusion:
http://img532.imageshack.us/img532/271/naturemountainsjpg.gif

Make your own:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/illusion.php

edit:
If anyone has any other optical illusions can be applied to most pictures, show me and I’ll try to make a script to do that as well. This stuff is fun.
[/quote]

Gravedigg.

Moparisthebest’s script doesn’t work anymore, I imagine during a server move something was broken.

error

Also could we get the source code for that php script?[/quote]

the script isn’t too complicated to make, all you do is take a colour image, invert the colours, show that for 15~ seconds then switch to black and white and apply some text and loading bars

Read full topic

item.title: Awesome Optical Illusion
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:42, topic:331789”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=428165.msg3151806#msg3151806 date=1268601611]

I think this illusion is really cool, so I decided to write a PHP script that would create one. I have, but haven’t polished it enough to upload and allow public use, but here are two quick examples:

church:
[imgi]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/6278/church.gif[/img]

flowers:
[imgi]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/184/flowerss.gif[/img]

I will probably let anyone upload images to convert to illusions tomorrow, or very soon. One problem is the final gif files are HUGE, anyone have any ideas on making them smaller automatically? Anyone see any other problems?

They’re completely black and white, and don’t change for me :\

What do you mean? The illusion doesn’t work or it doesn’t change colors ever?
[/quote]They both work fine. It must be his eyes that are messed up…

The image itself wasn’t changing for me, like it wouldn’t change to the inverted/bar loading thing. It’s working now though.

Alrighty. So my particular illusions work for everyone? I can’t tell if they work that well because I’m somewhat colorblind.

No because you uploaded them to Imageshit which sucks ASS. It won’t even fully load for me.[/quote]
ps, ur the only person whos ever had problems with imageshack

Read full topic
